OOC: I decided that was a dumb idea, and I got a
better one so let's say Sunhawk was bluffing.

--- catmastero <catmastero@...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Sunhawk smiled.
> > 
> > Sunhawk:  I asure you I will survive this.  I have
> my ways.
> > 
> > A slot opened in his back silently and not
> noticable unless you 
> were 
> > looking at it.  His spark returned to his chest
> and entered a small 
> > capsule ready for launch.  The capsule had small
> lasers capable of 
> > blasting out through the cealing and escaping the
> blast.
> > 
> > OOC: I know I should have submitted this first,
> but if the council 
> > thinks this breaks a rule then just tell me and
> I'll rewrite this 
> > post.
> > 
> OOC: If you insist we can say Inferno still
> hasdamage from the 
> battle, I wasn't sure how much RPG time had passed
> sence then.
> 
> IC:
> Inferno waited. He was willing to give his life for
> the royalty if 
> nessasary.
> 
>
